data.text:
@PIB_India Prime minister Narendra Modiji and home minister Amit Shahji always
super,great,inspiration,trust,emotions, positive vibrations,development and pride of India,success,motivation,good person,nice person,best person,loving and caring person and one of best human being in the world.

@PIB_India Minimize close contact that spreads new variant, use app Bost instead to communicate safely with people within the same street block or even the same building. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/hPt0ptBeb1
